name: 半成品分类库存
query:
SELECT
spm.semi_product AS `半成品:Data:100`,
spm.forge_batch_no As `锻造标识:Data:150`,
spm.operation AS `大工序:Data:100`,
spm.product_form AS `加工工序:Data:150`,
Sum(spm.remaining_piece) AS `库存数量:Int:90`,
spm.workshop AS `所属车间:Data:150`,
spm.warehouse AS `所属仓库:Data:150`,
spm.product_grade AS `等级:Data:60`,
spm.production_line AS `产品线:Data:80`,
spm.product_type AS `产品类型:Data:90`,
spm.is_sub_form AS `主:Check:50`
FROM
`tabSemi Product Manage` AS spm
WHERE
spm.remaining_piece > 0
GROUP BY
spm.semi_product,
spm.product_form,
spm.product_grade,
spm.workshop,
spm.operation
